Posts.Content: Please forgive me I need to say this. Bone fractures are no joking matter. MY bones look like honey combs. Lots of holes. I am on Xgeva or have been for the last 1 1/2 years. This I do not regret. I am also stage4 with major hits to the bone. The Iv one with the Jaw ulceration would have me thinking just like you. Pleace review bone remodaling. and Breast cancer cells in the bones.
Posts.Title: Zometa vs strontium citrate for bone mets
